```cmake
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

project(CIFAR10Classifier)

# 设置C++标准

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)


# 设置ONNX Runtime路径

set(ONNXRUNTIME_ROOT_DIR "D:/0.Project/0.VS/Py_project/ONNX/onnxruntime-win-x64-gpu-1.23.0")


# 包含头文件

include_directories(${ONNXRUNTIME_ROOT_DIR}/include)

include_directories(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src)


# 添加可执行文件

add_executable(CIFAR10Classifier

    src/main.cpp

    src/cifar10_reader.cpp

)


# 链接库

target_link_libraries(CIFAR10Classifier

    ${ONNXRUNTIME_ROOT_DIR}/lib/onnxruntime.lib

)


# 复制DLL文件到输出目录

add_custom_command(TARGET CIFAR10Classifier POST_BUILD

    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_if_different

        "${ONNXRUNTIME_ROOT_DIR}/lib/onnxruntime.dll"

        "${ONNXRUNTIME_ROOT_DIR}/lib/onnxruntime_providers_shared.dll"

        "${ONNXRUNTIME_ROOT_DIR}/lib/onnxruntime_providers_cuda.dll"

        $<TARGET_FILE_DIR:CIFAR10Classifier>

)
```
